items.name: mod_wiki_get_subwiki_pages
items.description: Returns the list of pages for a specific subwiki.

items.name: mod_wiki_get_subwikis
items.description: Returns the list of subwikis the user can see in a specific wiki.

items.name: mod_wiki_get_wikis_by_courses
items.description: Returns a list of wiki instances in a provided set of courses, if no courses are provided then all the wiki instances the user has access to will be returned.

items.name: mod_wiki_new_page
items.description: Create a new page in a subwiki.

items.name: mod_wiki_view_page
items.description: Trigger the page viewed event and update the module completion status.

items.name: mod_wiki_view_wiki
items.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

items.name: mod_workshop_add_submission
items.description: Add a new submission to a given workshop.

items.name: mod_workshop_delete_submission
items.description: Deletes the given submission.

items.name: mod_workshop_evaluate_assessment
items.description: Evaluates an assessment (used by teachers for provide feedback to the reviewer).

items.name: mod_workshop_evaluate_submission
items.description: Evaluates a submission (used by teachers for provide feedback or override the submission grade).

items.name: mod_workshop_get_assessment
items.description: Retrieves the given assessment.

items.name: mod_workshop_get_assessment_form_definition
items.description: Retrieves the assessment form definition.

items.name: mod_workshop_get_grades
items.description: Returns the assessment and submission grade for the given user.

items.name: mod_workshop_get_grades_report
items.description: Retrieves the assessment grades report.

items.name: mod_workshop_get_reviewer_assessments
items.description: Retrieves all the assessments reviewed by the given user.

items.name: mod_workshop_get_submission
items.description: Retrieves the given submission.

items.name: mod_workshop_get_submission_assessments
items.description: Retrieves all the assessments of the given submission.

items.name: mod_workshop_get_submissions
items.description: Retrieves all the workshop submissions or the one done by the given user (except example submissions).

items.name: mod_workshop_get_user_plan
items.description: Return the planner information for the given user.

items.name: mod_workshop_get_workshop_access_information
items.description: Return access information for a given workshop.

items.name: mod_workshop_get_workshops_by_courses
items.description: Returns a list of workshops in a provided list of courses, if no list is provided all workshops that the user can view will be returned.

items.name: mod_workshop_update_assessment
items.description: Add information to an allocated assessment.

items.name: mod_workshop_update_submission
items.description: Update the given submission.

items.name: mod_workshop_view_submission
items.description: Trigger the submission viewed event.

items.name: mod_workshop_view_workshop
items.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

items.name: report_competency_data_for_report
items.description: Load the data for the competency report in a course.

items.name: report_insights_action_executed
items.description: Stores an action executed over a group of predictions.

items.name: report_insights_set_fixed_prediction
items.description: Flags a prediction as fixed.

items.name: report_insights_set_notuseful_prediction
items.description: Flags the prediction as not useful.

items.name: tool_analytics_potential_contexts
items.description: Retrieve the list of potential contexts for a model.

items.description: Load the data for the competencies manage page template

items.description: Load the data for the related competencies template.

items.description: Load a summary of a user competency.

items.description: Load a summary of a user competency.

items.description: Load a summary of a user competency.

items.description: Load the data for the user evidence list page template

items.description: Load the data for the user evidence page template

items.description: List the courses using a competency

items.description: Search for cohorts.

items.description: Search for users.

items.name: tool_mobile_call_external_functions
items.description: Call multiple external functions and return all responses.

items.name: tool_mobile_get_autologin_key
items.description: Creates an auto-login key for the current user. Is created only in https sites and is restricted by time and ip address.

items.name: tool_mobile_get_config
items.description: Returns a list of the site configurations, filtering by section.

items.name: tool_mobile_get_content
items.description: Returns a piece of content to be displayed in the Mobile app.

items.name: tool_mobile_get_plugins_supporting_mobile
items.description: Returns a list of Moodle plugins supporting the mobile app.

items.name: tool_mobile_get_public_config
items.description: Returns a list of the site public settings, those not requiring authentication.

items.name: tool_templatelibrary_list_templates
items.description: List/search templates by component.

items.name: tool_templatelibrary_load_canonical_template
items.description: Load a canonical template by name (not the theme overidden one).

items.name: tool_usertours_complete_tour
items.description: Mark the specified tour as completed for the current user

items.name: tool_usertours_fetch_and_start_tour
items.description: Fetch the specified tour

items.name: tool_usertours_reset_tour
items.description: Remove the specified tour

items.name: tool_usertours_step_shown
items.description: Mark the specified step as completed for the current user

items.name: tool_xmldb_invoke_move_action
items.description: moves element up/down
